name: Banshee (Season 1)
summary: 故事的背景设定在宾夕法尼亚的女妖镇（Banshee），前罪犯Lucas Hood冒名顶替了女妖镇警长的身份，取代他成为了执法者。一方面，他用他新的合法身份继续秘密地犯罪，另一方面，他在来到小镇之前，曾经得罪的黑帮暴徒，誓要将他碎尸万段，他希望暴徒能够永远找不到他……
info:
• 中文名: 黑吃黑 第一季
  • 制作: HBO
  • 别名: 大盗警长 第一季
  • 集数: 10
  • 开始: 2013-01-11
  • 结束: 2013-02-22
  • 类型: 动作
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 频道: Cinemax
  • 电视台: HBO
  • 官方网站: http://www.cinemax.com/banshee/
  • imdb_id: tt2017109

eps.name: Pilot
eps.desc: After serving a fifteen year prison sentence, an unnamed criminal (Antony Starr) flees New York City when he is attacked by a group of gangsters. He heads to the small town of Banshee, Pennsylvania in search of his ex-lover and former accomplice Anastasia (Ivana Miličević), who is living under the name Carrie Hopewell with her new husband Gordon (Rus Blackwell) and their two children Deva (Ryann Shane) and Max (Gabriel Suttle). When the town's newly-appointed sheriff Lucas Hood (Griff Furst) is killed in a bar robbery, the criminal assumes his identity and takes up the mantle of sheriff of Banshee, with only the bar owner Sugar Bates (Frankie Faison) knowing the truth. Lucas learns from Banshee's young mayor Dan Kendall (Daniel Ross Owens) that the town is under the stranglehold of business owner and criminal entrepreneur Kai Proctor (Ulrich Thomsen), a former Amish who abandoned his faith in favor of illegal enterprises. Back in New York, mysterious crime boss Mr. Rabbit (Ben Cross) sends the gangsters after a former contact of Lucas's, Job (Hoon Lee), who helped Lucas forge paperwork to become sheriff. Job manages to escape, displeasing Mr. Rabbit, who instructs his employee to "find them both quickly."

eps.name: The Rave
eps.desc: Lucas is haunted by the memories of the night he was arrested, when he led the police away from Anna (now Carrie) so that she could escape with a consignment of diamonds they had stolen from Mr. Rabbit. He confronts her about his lingering feelings for her, but finds her reluctant to reciprocate. Meanwhile, Kai Proctor begins trying to earn Lucas's loyalty by warning him about the Moody Brothers, a local gang, but Lucas is determined to stay clean as he continues to build his new identity. Deva skips school with her boyfriend Reed (Hunter Garner), who takes her to a drug den operated by a local dealer, Hanson (Toby Leonard Moore). He invites them to a barn rave, which he uses to sell ecstasy. After a run-in with the Moody Brothers, Lucas has a one night stand with Rebecca Bowman (Lili Simmons), a devout Amish girl by day but a rebellious party-girl by night. Things at the rave grow out of control when several people (including Reed) O.D.. Thanks to a tip from Rebecca's father Elijah, Lucas and the rest of the BSD arrive to break up the rave, but not in time to save Reed's life. Hanson escapes and is revealed to be working for Proctor, who feeds Hanson to his Rottweiler for selling the tainted drugs.

eps.name: Meet the New Boss
eps.desc: In New York, Carrie drops in on Mr. Rabbit, who is revealed to be her father. He offers her a deal: return the diamonds she stole from him the night she disappeared and deliver Lucas to him and he will leave her alone forever. Meanwhile, an MMA prizefighter named Mr. Sanchez (Cedric Stewart) arrives in Banshee for an exhibition fight as part of a deal between Proctor and Benjamin Longshadow (Russell Means) to build a new casino. When Sanchez beats and rapes a local cocktail waitress, Lucas uses it as an opportunity to prove to Proctor that he is not for sale and, after a vicious fight with Sanchez, beats the prizefighter almost to death and ruins Proctor's deal with Longshadow. Proctor confronts Lucas about his poor decision and suggests that Lucas should start being afraid of him. A security guard uploads a video of Lucas throttling Sanchez onto YouTube.

eps.name: Half Deaf Is Better Than All Dead
eps.desc: Lucas goes back to his old ways and gets trapped inside a state museum he is robbing and ends up having to turn to his old crew - Job and Carrie - for help escaping. Using evidence provided by a white supremacist, Arno, Lucas and Emmet are able to arrest Proctor for the murder of Hanson. While transporting him, they are attacked by the Moody Brothers, who want revenge for Lucas Hood killing their brother. A fight ensues, in which Lucas, Emmet, and Proctor defeat the Moody brothers (Lucas even cuts off one of the leaders ears). Carrie keeps reminiscing about her time with Lucas but he is more interested in Kat Moody.

eps.name: The Kindred
eps.desc: Job moves to Banshee and starts making new plans with Lucas. When a member of a motorcycle gang attempts to rape Carrie, Siobhan arrives on scene and kills the man. The motorcycle gang swear vengance and burns down Siobhan's house. In response Lucas beats up the motorcycle gang and has them transported out of Banshee. Meanwhile, an FBI agent comes to Banshee to investigate some missing files.

eps.name: Wicks
eps.desc: A former fellow inmate named Wicks recognizes Lucas. This triggers a series of flashbacks to when Lucas was in prison. When in prison, Lucas had to deal with the advances and assaults of a gay, Albino, inmate who worked for Mr. Rabbit. One of the assaults nearly killed Lucas. During a confrontation in front of the entire prison, Lucas manages to defeat the Albino by cutting off his penis and destroying the Albino's eyeballs. Lucas then killed the Albino. In the present, Wicks attempted to blackmail Lucas by threatening to reveal to everyone in Banshee Lucas' true identity, but is kill by Sugar and Lucas. In the post credit scene, Lucas receives a voice mail from the son of the real Lucas Hood.

eps.name: Behold a Pale Rider
eps.desc: When a drug store robbery turns into a massive hostage situation led by two gunmen, Carrie's daughter is one of the student held at gunpoint. At the same time Rabbit is on his way to Lucas who has been drugged and handcuffed to a motel bed by Carrie. Aided by Job, Lucas escapes. Lucas then goes to the school and kills the gunman. After the hostage crisis is resolved, Mr. Rabbit watches television and recognizes Carrie. Mr. Rabbit sends Olek to Banshee to capture Carrie.

eps.name: We Shall Live Forever
eps.desc: Carrie tells Lucas that Deva is his daughter.Olek, an employee of Mr. Rabbit arrives and attempts to capture Carrie, only to be captured by Lucas and Carrie in return. Kai Proctor's niece Rebecca Bowman is forced to leave her Amish home. She moves in with her uncle and reaches out for Lucas. Kai confronts his Amish family. Proctor also finds out that his niece was having intercourse with Lucas and is enraged. Chief Longshadow's daughter comes to town. While Luas leaves Carrie alone with Olek, Olek manages to break free of his constraints, resulting in a fight that lasts the majority of the episode. Olek manages to deal a critical blow on Carrie before she slowly kills him. Lucas arrives shortly after the fight concludes and finds the near dead Carrie lying on the floor.

eps.name: Always the Cowboy
eps.desc: Carrie is in ICU. Her husband Gordon runs into Lucas and later confronts her with his doubts. Job and Sugar bury Olek's body. Mr. Rabbit prepares a large scale action in Banshee. Trying to secure Max, Carrie is too late and sees him being abducted by Mr. Rabbit. The FBI agent takes charge of the kidnapping investigation. Lucas and Kai Proctor come to an arrangement after a short fight about Lucas' affair with Rebecca. Rebecca is introduced into the family business. Mr. Rabbit introduces himself to his new family, much to the horror of Deva. Later Mr. Rabbit confronts Lucas and tells him that this will be the last time they see each other. As soon as Mr. Rabbit leaves the building the sounds of gun's being readied could be heard and Lucas ducks in desperation.

eps.name: A Mixture of Madness
eps.desc: In the past, Lucas gets close to a counselor evaluating his early release. It is eventually revealed that the counselor worked for Mr. Rabbit. Mr. Rabbit's employees attack the sheriff's office but are killed by Proctor and Burton. Lucas hands over his badge and weapon to Brock and exchanges himself to Mr. Rabbit for Max. Sugar, Job, Emmett, Siobhan, and Brock go to Mr. Rabbits out post to save Lucas and a shoot out occurs. Sugar is shot in the shoulder and Brock is critically wounded (but manages to kill one of Mr. Rabbit's employees who was planning to blow up the room). Mr. Rabbit tortures Lucas and prepares to kill him when Carrie arrives. After a brief exchange of words, Carrie shoots her father twice.
